sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The lives, opinions, and remarkable sayings of the most famous ancient philosophers. The first volume written in Greek, by Diogenes Laertius ; made English by several hands ... De vitis philosophorum. English Diogenes Laertius.
[4], 589 p., [1] leaf of plates : port.
Printed for Edward Brewster ..., London : 1688.
"The names of the translators": p. [14] Contains engraved frontispiece portrait of Diogenes Laertius. Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

Printed for Edward Brewster ..., London : 1688.
"The names of the translators": p. [14] Contains engraved frontispiece portrait of Diogenes Laertius. Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
